document.full_text: president barack obama said he challenged republicans to try to repeal his landmark healthcare reform in private budget talks last week, taunting his opponents with a question: "you think we're stupid?"
document.title: obama to republicans: 'you think we're stupid?'
lines_and_colors: president barack obama said he challenged republicans to try to repeal his landmark healthcare reform in private budget talks last week, taunting his opponents with a question: "you think we're stupid?"
